objectscale-s3-client
  • ObjectScale S3 Client documentation

ObjectScale S3 Client documentation

You use the ObjectScale S3 Client to access object level storage through the traditional Boto3 commands but with the extension of search metadata availability. The Client provides an object-oriented API for developers to use in Python.
